name: Kung Fu Saga: Martial Path
description:
This is a mysterious and colorful oriental world.
There are dense and prosperous ancient forests,
There are peaceful and primitive banyan,
There are various pets wandering freely,
There is glacial lasting over thousands of years,
You will feel the changes of seasons and climates, the vividity of shadow and light...
The moment you stepping into Kung Fu Saga, you will avatar to a Kung Fu master and a fantasy adventure awaits you!

[Rich Welfare]
You can get 1000 draws to gain various awards as your newbie property, which will help you fit this journey better!

[Splendid Performance]
Kung Fu Saga is one of the most welcomed RPG game in Asia. It performs quite well in Southeast Asia, Mainland China, Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan, Japan and South Korea on both download&revenue rank! This game has attracted more than 10 million players to enter this mysterious world until now!

[Various Occupations]
There are 5 different occupations for selection in game! Take control and learn the Taos of this world.

[Buddies Gather to Slay Boss]
You will meet friends from different regions here! Take your weapons, join the guilds, and gather your buddies to slay boss together. This will tell the benefits of teamwork.

[Diverse Mounts and Pets]
You can find loyal mounts and pets everwhere on this vast land, just collect and tame them.
Imagine wander freely with a big, cute panda? Your dream will come true now!
